wikipedia_page.main: Brian Whittaker (23 September 1956 – 7 September 1997) was a Scottish professional footballer who played for Partick Thistle, Celtic,  Heart of Midlothian and Falkirk.

response: In August 2013, Bresler signed on with FOX Sports to direct Fight Stories with Urijah Faber, an animated web series hosted by Urijah Faber. The first episode stars comedian Brian Whittaker and the second features comedian Daryl Wright.
Brian Whitaker (sometimes credited as Brian Whittaker; born 13 June 1947) is a British journalist and writer.

Buckley's speed and crossing ability quickly made him a crowd favourite at Firhill, as Peter Cormack's team competed for promotion to the Scottish Premier Division. He scored on his Scottish Football League debut in April 1983. In August 1983 Buckley joined Thistle permanently, as part of Celtic's £65,000 capture of Brian Whittaker. He remained a regular throughout the 1983–84 season.
